refnamediv.refpurpose: calculate the area of intersection of polygons

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: When passed a pair of polygons, specified as arrays of point_t (and their lengths), calculates their area of intersection.
The method of calculation reduces the area integration to a boundary integration using Green's theorem; this is the same principle as is used in the planimeter.

refsect1.title: RETURN VALUE
refsect1.para: Returns the area of intersection of the polygons as a float.

refsect1.title: AUTHORS
refsect1.para: The design of the algorithm and its implementation for GCC is due to Norman Hardy (see Hardy's Cap Lore site for further details).
This implementation in C99 is by J.J. Green.
